text:
REPORTS OF WORKSHOPS AMD SEMINARS
2.
Publ.
No.
W-l Public School Broadcasting (Third Allerton Seminar) - Harry Lamb, Editor
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of the seminar
on in-school broadcasting, held at Allerton Park, University of
Illinois, June 15-24, 1952. 50 pp. Paper. $1.00
W-2 In-School Writers* Seminar - Edward Stasheff, Editor
A report of the seminar for writers of in-school radio programs
held at Station KSLH, St. Louis, Missouri, June 7-H; 1954. 36 PP*
Paper. $1.00
W-3 NAEB Region II Seminar Workshop Report - R. F. Schenkkan, Editor
Report of meeting of NAEB members in Region II, held March 13-14,
1953; at the University of North Carolina. 25 pp. Paper, $1.00
W-4 NAEB Region III Workshop Proceedings - William Bender, Jr., Editor
Report of the meeting of NAEB members in Region III, held May 22-24,
1953, at the University of Michigan. 19 pp. Paper. $1.00
W-5 NAEB Lincoln Lodge Seminar on Educational Television - Burton Paulu, Editor
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of leaders in the
field of educational broadcasting who gathered at the University of
Wisconsin, June 21-27, 1953; for an intensive "think session" about
educational television. June, 1953* 109 PP« Paper. $2.00
W-6 NAEB First TV Production Workshop - 1953 - Edward Stasheff, Editor
Report of production workshop for persons engaged in educational
television, held at the University of Illinois, August 28-Septem-
ber 18, 1953* September, 1953* 112 pp. Paper. $2.00
W-7 NAEB Second TV Production Workshop - 1954 - Edward Stasheff, Editor
Report of the production workshop for persons engaged in educational
television, held at Michigan State University, August 23-Septem-
ber 10, 1954. An account of its lectures, demonstrations, pro¬
cedures and projects. April, 1955* 133 PP« Paper. $2.00
W-8 NAEB First TV Engineering Workshop - 1954 - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor
Report of the engineering workshop for technical personnel in
educational television, held in New York City, October 22-26,
1954. June, 1955* 6l pp. Paper. $2.00
W-9 NAEB Management Seminar - 1953
Report of the seminar for educational television management personnel,
held at Iowa State College. September, 1955* Paper. $1.00
F-10 NAEB Region IV Meeting
Report of the meeting of NAEB members in Region IV, held October
1, 1954, at Iowa State College. October, 1954. 24 pp. Paper.
$1.00
